alert.note: Alert for South Lincoln County; Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 1:52PM MST until February 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Potential total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches in the lower elevations with 12 to 20 inches in the mountains. Northeast wind could gust as high as 30 to 45 mph across south Lincoln County and the mountains. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West, Upper Green River Basin Foothills, Upper Green River Basin and South Lincoln County. * WHEN...From late Monday night through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible as the snow and wind combine to create reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow could begin earlier and be slightly heavier in Bondurant Valley and over The Rim.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. This storm has the potential to create widespread travel impacts.

area.areaDesc: South Lincoln County; Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Wind River Mountains West
